column4: ugh i don't get this.... usb drive is fat32, used unetboonin to load up ubuntu 9.10 full on there, chose usb drive in bios and it says "Boot Error"
can't install from cd rom / floppy cus i don't have those on target machine ;\\
ok did you use an .iso file or from the cd
first after you downloaded the .iso did you chk5sum it
that will tell you if it downloaded properly
try formatting the drive then try again.
ive done it like a million times tonight
what is to main os you are using
ah ok u3 may be problem. look at this http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-hardware-18/using-unetbootin-on-a-win-xp-to-make-a-usb-stick-771877/
good on you glas to help. did you keep u3 incase you need it
